author: conor
msg: Change the test for an empty classpath. Need to avoid classpaths
which evaluate to an empty string or the -classpath will swallow the
next parameter, usually the class to execute.

author: conor
msg: Do not use undocumented -noexit flag for weblogic's ejbc. It is not
currently required anyhow but would be in the future if the ejbc
is to be run in VM (I tried recently with poor results). Also a
security manager is going to be required one of these days
